Texts.Chs: 你可以抓一些^orange;其他种类的蜜蜂^white;，然后互相繁殖它们。这样你的蜜蜂种类才会越来越多。我建议首先你可以尝试到森林寻找蜜蜂！
Texts.Eng: Find ^orange;other types of bees^white;, and cross-breed them within. You never know what you'll end up with! I suggest searching for Forest Bees as soon as possible!

Texts.Chs: 首先你需要准备好^orange;捕虫网^reset;，然后各抓一只^orange;蜂后和工蜂^white;，并放进你的蜂箱内繁殖。蜜蜂在大多数星球都可以遇到，而它们的活动时间通常在白天。
Texts.Eng: Now you need to ^orange;catch a queen and a drone honey bee^white; and let them loose inside your apiary. You'll need a ^orange;bug net^reset; for this. Bees can be found on most biomes, usually during the daylight hours.
